nodes.text: A fuel cell, also referred to as a fuel core or fuel rod, was a part of a blaster or starship engine that contained its fuel. They were manufactured through the use of chemical churners and impact sifters. Plutonium combined with uranium was put into starfighter fuel cells.

Around 3638 BBY, Doctor Juvard Illip Oggurobb of the Hutt Cartel developed isotope-5 fuel rods. During the Conquest of Makeb, the fuel rods were contested between the Cartel and the Galactic Republic in order to escape Makeb aboard the Ark.
Wiborg Jenssen was a company that produced fuel cells for the twin ion engines of TIE Series craft. Fuel cells like the ones in YT-1300 light freighters were powered with a liquid metal fuel.
Chez O'nder once had to try to eat a blaster's fuel cell after losing a bet, and it fused his lips together.
